channel.title: PvP - Pking servers
channel.description:
Simple question/discussion thread:
[ul][li]What to do to get the server more 'boring-less' :|[/li] [li]How would you earn high-level weapons and other rare items.[/li] [li]Any other unique ideas?[/li][/ul]

item.title: PvP - Pking servers
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:545227”]A few quick ideas:

Create an unsafe minigame where everybody is on it’s own.
You earn points based on how long you lasted (don’t make hiding spots for low level guys)
which you can spend on high tier items.
If you win the minigame x times you get another god tier item.

A sort of parallel world would be awesome as well.
You would be ‘ghosty’ or some kind of recognition that people can see that you’re in the parallel world.
you can earn better items in the parallel world but you have to risk for the items and you are much weaker against people that are not in the parallel world.[/quote]

I was actually thinking to make custom maps so that’s a great idea!

Read full topic
